item.title: Repo Man. Report by Colbert

item.description: On vacation, and I miss all the good stuff. Well, here’s some funnies for the AB.

item.title: Colbert Report explains the unemployment rate
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: On Monday’s 3/17/08 episode Mr. Stephen Colberts to the opportunity in his “The Word” segment to explain the need for confidence in the economy, the declining unemployment rate and the loss of 63,00 jobs. Titled: The Audacity of Hopelessness The blog would not let me embed the video.
item.content:encoded:
On Monday’s 3/17/08 episode Mr. Stephen Colberts to the opportunity in his “The Word” segment to explain the need for confidence in the economy, the declining unemployment rate and the loss of 63,00 jobs. Titled: The Audacity of Hopelessness

The blog would not let me embed the video.
